attributes.action: Ban smoking in the House of Commons and House of Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that if the people who are elected to SERVE the common person say that we can no longer smoke in work or public places then that ban should also cover the smoking area's in the House of Lords and House of Commons. It is an outrage that they dictate terms to us but do not believe in them themselves.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
